movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

movies.title: Red Notice
movies.description: In the world of international crime, an Interpol agent attempts to hunt down and capture the world's most wanted art thief.

movies.title: The Addams Family 2
movies.description: The Addams get tangled up in more wacky adventures and find themselves involved in hilarious run-ins with all sorts of unsuspecting characters.

movies.title: Sing 2
movies.description: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO. This complex journey into the subconscious is a groundbreaking tale of intrigue and revelation.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college. It's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he faces lawsuits by those who claim he stole their idea, and his co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

movies.title: Black Swan
movies.description: Nina, a talented but unstable ballet dancer, competes for the lead in 'Swan Lake,' a role that requires her to embody both the pure White Swan and the sinister Black Swan. As the pressures mount, Nina's grip on reality begins to slip, leading to a descent into madness.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.description: In this psychological thriller directed by Martin Scorsese, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is assigned to investigate the disappearance of a patient from Boston's Shutter Island Ashecliffe Hospital. He uncovers shocking truths about the place and his own unresolved past.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.description: This animated adventure film tells the story of a young Viking named Hiccup who aspires to follow his tribe's tradition of becoming a dragon slayer. After capturing his first dragon, he realizes that there is more to these creatures than he assumed.

movies.title: Kick-Ass
movies.description: Directed by Matthew Vaughn, 'Kick-Ass' is a superhero black comedy based on the comic book of the same name. It tells the story of an ordinary teenager, Dave Lizewski, who sets out to become a real-life superhero, calling himself 'Kick-Ass'.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.description: A whimsical adventure as Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood, embarking on a journey to find her true destiny.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.description: Tony Stark faces pressure from the government, the press, and the public to share his technology with the military, while also tackling new enemies.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.description: A supervillain named Gru plans the biggest heist in the history of the world: to steal the moon. However, his plans are altered by three orphaned girls.

movies.title: Bad Boys for Life
movies.description: Miami detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett must face off against a mother-and-son pair of drug lords who wreak vengeful havoc on their city.

movies.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
movies.description: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

movies.title: Birds of Prey
movies.description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

movies.title: Dolittle
movies.description: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

movies.title: The Invisible Man
movies.description: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, the Parks. But their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
During World War I, two British soldiers are sent to deliver an urgent message to an isolated regiment. If the message is not received in time, the regiment will walk into a trap and be massacred.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.description: T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. When a powerful enemy suddenly reappears, T'Challa's mettle as king -- and as Black Panther -- gets tested when he's drawn into a formidable conflict that puts the fate of Wakanda and the entire world at risk.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Incredibles 2
movies.description: Helen is called on to lead a campaign to bring Supers back, while Bob navigates the day-to-day heroics of "normal" life at home with Violet, Dash, and baby Jack-Jack—whose superpowers are about to be discovered.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering unease about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress meet and fall in love in Los Angeles, navigating the joys and pains of pursuing their dreams.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.description: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.
